title: Itho Intha Nenjodu Song Lyrics Good Luck
stanzas:
Itho Intha Nenjodu Song Lyrics Good Luck
#GoodLuck #SPB #KSChitra

Idho enthan nenjodu
orey veeduthan
orey veedu ullathellaam
nee vazhthaan.

unadhu uyiril
sari paadhi konden
enadhu uyiril
muzhumaiyum thandhen.

ovvondrum mudiyum
endur vingyaanam sollum.
nam kadhal mudiyaadhendru
en niyaanam sollum

kaalangal vazhum kaalame
nam kadhal ellai vazhume
en kaigal unnil neelume
imaikkaamal unnai aalume.

nilavai madithu
un koonthal mudippen
vinmeen parithu
maniyaaram thoduppen.

vaeredhum vendaam vendaam
un maarbu podhum.
uyir pogum kaalam koodu
oru paarvai podhum.

un sollil vedham ketkiren
un kannil ennai paarkiren
unnodu ennai serkiren.
un maarbil kannam theikkiren.

Idho enthan nenjodu
orey veeduthan
orey veedu ullathellaam
nee vazhthaan.

seo.title: Itho Intha Nenjodu Song Lyrics Good Luck
seo.description: Get the complete Itho Intha Nenjodu Song Lyrics Good Luck from Good Luck. composed by Manoj Bhatnaghar and sung by K.S.Chitra. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Good Luck, Manoj Bhatnaghar, K.S.Chitra, SPB, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
